{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251632,"originalJapaneseLine":"断るとランス","translatedEnglishLine":"If you refuse, says Rance,"},{"lineNumber":251633,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら、大食い競争で勝負だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"then we'll settle it with an eating contest."},{"lineNumber":251634,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、うっとおしい、男なら武力で勝負だ。女の奪い合いはケンカと昔から決まっているのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, annoying! If you're a man, then fight with force. Competing over women has always been settled by fighting since old times."},{"lineNumber":251635,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":251636,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B"},{"lineNumber":251637,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　条件．香姫が場にいる時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Kōhime is on the field"},{"lineNumber":251638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251639,"originalJapaneseLine":"腹が減ったと言い出すガルティア。腹の穴が開き吸い込み始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia suddenly says she's hungry. A hole opens in her stomach and begins sucking in."},{"lineNumber":251640,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見てランス、やばい・・こっちみろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that, Rance thinks, 'Oh no... Look over here!'"},{"lineNumber":251641,"originalJapaneseLine":"と香姫を使う。","translatedEnglishLine":"He uses Kōhime."},{"lineNumber":251642,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアは腹の穴を止める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia stops the hole in her stomach."},{"lineNumber":251643,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B"},{"lineNumber":251644,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　条件．場にカロリアが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: Karoria is on the field"},{"lineNumber":251645,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　　すでに　戦闘／香姫で　吸い込み攻撃は止めている状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Where the suction attack has already been stopped by Kōhime during battle."},{"lineNumber":251646,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251647,"originalJapaneseLine":"カロリア、ムシ使い関係の何か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Karoria, something related to bug taming..."},{"lineNumber":251648,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B"},{"lineNumber":251649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　条件．前のターンに香姫が毒だんご攻撃をした時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Kōhime used a poison dumpling attack in the previous turn"},{"lineNumber":251650,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251651,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと待てとガルティア。","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a moment, says Galtia."},{"lineNumber":251652,"originalJapaneseLine":"さきほどの攻撃で香姫が投げつけた　だんごを大事に持っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"She is carefully holding the dumpling that Kōhime threw in the earlier attack."},{"lineNumber":251653,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは匠の名品、味わってくわないといけないとゆっくり食べ始める。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a masterpiece of a craftsman. I have to savor it properly, she begins eating slowly."},{"lineNumber":251654,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見てランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that, Rance says,"},{"lineNumber":251655,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、今のうちに攻撃をガンガンかけろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, attack her relentlessly while she’s distracted."},{"lineNumber":251656,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴は毒だんごに夢中だ、香ちゃん、もっといったぱい作れ、そして投げろー","translatedEnglishLine":"She’s obsessed with the poison dumplings. Kō-chan, make a lot more and throw them!"},{"lineNumber":251657,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアはバタンと倒れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia collapsed with a thud."},{"lineNumber":251658,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアは死にかけた時、最後に言う　死ぬ前にあれをもう一本食わせてくれ","translatedEnglishLine":"When Galtia was about to die, she said one last thing: 'Before I die, please let me have one more of those.'"},{"lineNumber":251659,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、うめぇ・お前、世界一のだんご職人だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahh, delicious... You’re the world’s best dumpling maker."},{"lineNumber":251660,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにいってんだ、こいつは世界一だんご作りが下手だぞ、とランス","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying? She’s the worst dumpling maker in the world, says Rance."},{"lineNumber":251661,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかってないな、そうか、このうまさは人間どもには強すぎて毒なのかもしれんな","translatedEnglishLine":"You don’t understand. I see, this deliciousness might be too strong for humans — it could be poison for them."},{"lineNumber":251662,"originalJapaneseLine":"はははは、この味が分かるのは俺だけという訳か、なんかうれしいな","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, so I’m the only one who can understand this flavor. Somehow, that makes me happy."},{"lineNumber":251663,"originalJapaneseLine":"といいながら死んでいく","translatedEnglishLine":"And with that, she dies."},{"lineNumber":251664,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐっ、くやしいとランスもだんごを食うが、やっぱり気絶","translatedEnglishLine":"Gritting his teeth in frustration, Rance eats a dumpling too, but ends up passing out as well."},{"lineNumber":251665,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティア様がやられたぞ・・魔物兵があわてて逃げて行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia-sama has been defeated... The monster soldiers hurriedly flee."},{"lineNumber":251666,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはすぐにこの方面の魔軍全体に広がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"This quickly spread throughout the entire demon army in this area."},{"lineNumber":251667,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアのお陰で戦う事もなく人間から食料を奪い、くっちゃねくっちゃねして","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to Galtia, the demon soldiers who had been stealing food from humans and lazing around without fighting,"},{"lineNumber":251668,"originalJapaneseLine":"のほほんと過ごしてきた魔軍兵士は攻めてきたゼス軍に対処出来ずに潰走","translatedEnglishLine":"were unprepared and overwhelmed, so they were routed by the advancing Zeth army."},{"lineNumber":251669,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251670,"originalJapaneseLine":"司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Headquarters"},{"lineNumber":251671,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックと千鶴子、ランスがガルティアを倒した事を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic and Chizuruko hear that Rance defeated Galtia."},{"lineNumber":251672,"originalJapaneseLine":"うれしい、でも、敵はまだ強大、メディウサ・・そして多数の魔軍","translatedEnglishLine":"They're glad, but the enemy is still powerful: Medusa... and a large demon army."},{"lineNumber":251673,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２回目間大量の料理をランス達は食べきり、大食い競争は引き分けとなる","translatedEnglishLine":"During the second round, Rance and others finish eating a large amount of food, resulting in a draw in the eating contest."},{"lineNumber":251674,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tガルティアは感激する。人間なのにすごいな。お前ら","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia is impressed: 'Even though you’re human, that’s amazing. You guys.'"},

{"lineNumber":251675,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tではもう食後のデザートだ、まだあるのかよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"'Well then, here comes the dessert after the meal. Is there still more...?'"},

{"lineNumber":251676,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t何か話の流れがあって、香姫のだんごをガルティアが食べる","translatedEnglishLine":"Following some flow of conversation, Galtia eats Kōhime’s dumplings."},

{"lineNumber":251677,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそして団子に惚れ込んで、ランス達の仲間に加わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, fascinated by the dumplings, she joins Rance and his companions."},

{"lineNumber":251678,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tガルティアが裏切った、逃げろー魔物兵は敗走","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia betrayed them! Run! The monster soldiers rout in defeat."},

{"lineNumber":251679,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t司令部、マジック、千鶴子、ほっと一息","translatedEnglishLine":"At headquarters, Magic and Chizuruko breathe a sigh of relief."},

{"lineNumber":251680,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t内容は(２３０／その後の戦局Ａ)とほぼ同じ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The content is almost the same as (230 / Subsequent Battle Situation A)."}, 

{"lineNumber":251681,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tただし、ガルティアは殺されたではなく魔軍を裏切って","translatedEnglishLine":"However, instead of being killed, Galtia betrays the demon army,"},

{"lineNumber":251682,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの仲間になったという展開で","translatedEnglishLine":"and the story develops with her becoming Rance’s ally."},

{"lineNumber":251683,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t臨時首都にランス達が戻る、ガルティアをみんなに紹介","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others return to the temporary capital and introduce Galtia to everyone."},

{"lineNumber":251684,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカオスはガルティアを殺したそうだったが、昨晩男同士で話をして意気投合している？","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos apparently wanted to kill Galtia, but after talking as men last night, they bonded?"},

{"lineNumber":251685,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこいつなかなかいいやつだ、殺すのは少し後でもいいなとか","translatedEnglishLine":"'This guy’s pretty good after all, maybe we can kill her a little later,' or something like that."},

{"lineNumber":251686,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tゼスの面々との会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation with the Zeth personnel."},

{"lineNumber":251687,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t誰かがガルティアの食事について不安がってもいいかな、食事どうしようとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe someone expresses concern about Galtia’s diet, like 'What about her meals?'"},

{"lineNumber":251688,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tガルティア、たまには絶食してもいいぜ、けっこう食ったしな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia can fast occasionally; she’s eaten quite a bit."},

{"lineNumber":251689,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t一日１００キロでいいや。どこが絶食やねんとか","translatedEnglishLine":"'Eating 100 kilos a day is fine.' 'How is that fasting?' and so on."},

{"lineNumber":251690,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス、とりあえず今回の作戦は完了だな、いったん戻るか","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says, 'For now, this operation is complete. Let’s return for the time being.'"}, 

{"lineNumber":251691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだが、早く済んだから予定していたより時間もあるな・・","translatedEnglishLine":"But since it finished early, we have more time than planned..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断るとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you refuse, says Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、大食い競争で勝負だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then we'll settle it with an eating contest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、うっとおしい、男なら武力で勝負だ。女の奪い合いはケンカと昔から決まっているのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, annoying! If you're a man, then fight with force. Competing over women has always been settled by fighting since old times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件．香姫が場にいる時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Kōhime is on the field

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹が減ったと言い出すガルティア。腹の穴が開き吸い込み始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia suddenly says she's hungry. A hole opens in her stomach and begins sucking in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てランス、やばい・・こっちみろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, Rance thinks, 'Oh no... Look over here!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と香姫を使う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He uses Kōhime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは腹の穴を止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia stops the hole in her stomach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件．場にカロリアが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: Karoria is on the field

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに　戦闘／香姫で　吸い込み攻撃は止めている状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where the suction attack has already been stopped by Kōhime during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カロリア、ムシ使い関係の何か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Karoria, something related to bug taming...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件．前のターンに香姫が毒だんご攻撃をした時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Kōhime used a poison dumpling attack in the previous turn

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待てとガルティア。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment, says Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどの攻撃で香姫が投げつけた　だんごを大事に持っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is carefully holding the dumpling that Kōhime threw in the earlier attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは匠の名品、味わってくわないといけないとゆっくり食べ始める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a masterpiece of a craftsman. I have to savor it properly, she begins eating slowly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, Rance says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、今のうちに攻撃をガンガンかけろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, attack her relentlessly while she’s distracted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴は毒だんごに夢中だ、香ちゃん、もっといったぱい作れ、そして投げろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s obsessed with the poison dumplings. Kō-chan, make a lot more and throw them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアはバタンと倒れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia collapsed with a thud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは死にかけた時、最後に言う　死ぬ前にあれをもう一本食わせてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Galtia was about to die, she said one last thing: 'Before I die, please let me have one more of those.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、うめぇ・お前、世界一のだんご職人だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahh, delicious... You’re the world’s best dumpling maker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにいってんだ、こいつは世界一だんご作りが下手だぞ、とランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying? She’s the worst dumpling maker in the world, says Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかってないな、そうか、このうまさは人間どもには強すぎて毒なのかもしれんな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You don’t understand. I see, this deliciousness might be too strong for humans — it could be poison for them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はははは、この味が分かるのは俺だけという訳か、なんかうれしいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, so I’m the only one who can understand this flavor. Somehow, that makes me happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: といいながら死んでいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, she dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ、くやしいとランスもだんごを食うが、やっぱり気絶
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gritting his teeth in frustration, Rance eats a dumpling too, but ends up passing out as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティア様がやられたぞ・・魔物兵があわてて逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia-sama has been defeated... The monster soldiers hurriedly flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはすぐにこの方面の魔軍全体に広がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This quickly spread throughout the entire demon army in this area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアのお陰で戦う事もなく人間から食料を奪い、くっちゃねくっちゃねして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to Galtia, the demon soldiers who had been stealing food from humans and lazing around without fighting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のほほんと過ごしてきた魔軍兵士は攻めてきたゼス軍に対処出来ずに潰走
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were unprepared and overwhelmed, so they were routed by the advancing Zeth army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックと千鶴子、ランスがガルティアを倒した事を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Chizuruko hear that Rance defeated Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うれしい、でも、敵はまだ強大、メディウサ・・そして多数の魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're glad, but the enemy is still powerful: Medusa... and a large demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２回目間大量の料理をランス達は食べきり、大食い競争は引き分けとなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the second round, Rance and others finish eating a large amount of food, resulting in a draw in the eating contest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは感激する。人間なのにすごいな。お前ら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia is impressed: 'Even though you’re human, that’s amazing. You guys.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではもう食後のデザートだ、まだあるのかよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Well then, here comes the dessert after the meal. Is there still more...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か話の流れがあって、香姫のだんごをガルティアが食べる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following some flow of conversation, Galtia eats Kōhime’s dumplings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして団子に惚れ込んで、ランス達の仲間に加わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, fascinated by the dumplings, she joins Rance and his companions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアが裏切った、逃げろー魔物兵は敗走
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia betrayed them! Run! The monster soldiers rout in defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部、マジック、千鶴子、ほっと一息
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At headquarters, Magic and Chizuruko breathe a sigh of relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容は(２３０／その後の戦局Ａ)とほぼ同じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content is almost the same as (230 / Subsequent Battle Situation A).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし、ガルティアは殺されたではなく魔軍を裏切って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, instead of being killed, Galtia betrays the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの仲間になったという展開で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the story develops with her becoming Rance’s ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臨時首都にランス達が戻る、ガルティアをみんなに紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others return to the temporary capital and introduce Galtia to everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスはガルティアを殺したそうだったが、昨晩男同士で話をして意気投合している？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos apparently wanted to kill Galtia, but after talking as men last night, they bonded?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつなかなかいいやつだ、殺すのは少し後でもいいなとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'This guy’s pretty good after all, maybe we can kill her a little later,' or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの面々との会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with the Zeth personnel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがガルティアの食事について不安がってもいいかな、食事どうしようとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe someone expresses concern about Galtia’s diet, like 'What about her meals?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティア、たまには絶食してもいいぜ、けっこう食ったしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia can fast occasionally; she’s eaten quite a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日１００キロでいいや。どこが絶食やねんとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Eating 100 kilos a day is fine.' 'How is that fasting?' and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、とりあえず今回の作戦は完了だな、いったん戻るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says, 'For now, this operation is complete. Let’s return for the time being.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、早く済んだから予定していたより時間もあるな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But since it finished early, we have more time than planned...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

A hole opens in her stomach and begins sucking in."},{"lineNumber":251640,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見てランス、やばい・・こっちみろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that, Rance thinks, 'Oh no... Look over here!'"},{"lineNumber":251641,"originalJapaneseLine":"と香姫を使う。","translatedEnglishLine":"He uses Kōhime."},{"lineNumber":251642,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアは腹の穴を止める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia stops the hole in her stomach."},{"lineNumber":251643,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B"},{"lineNumber":251644,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　条件．場にカロリアが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: Karoria is on the field"},{"lineNumber":251645,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　　すでに　戦闘／香姫で　吸い込み攻撃は止めている状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Where the suction attack has already been stopped by Kōhime during battle."},{"lineNumber":251646,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251647,"originalJapaneseLine":"カロリア、ムシ使い関係の何か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Karoria, something related to bug taming..."},{"lineNumber":251648,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B"},{"lineNumber":251649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　条件．前のターンに香姫が毒だんご攻撃をした時","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: When Kōhime used a poison dumpling attack in the previous turn"},{"lineNumber":251650,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251651,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと待てとガルティア。","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a moment, says Galtia."},{"lineNumber":251652,"originalJapaneseLine":"さきほどの攻撃で香姫が投げつけた　だんごを大事に持っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"She is carefully holding the dumpling that Kōhime threw in the earlier attack."},{"lineNumber":251653,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは匠の名品、味わってくわないといけないとゆっくり食べ始める。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a masterpiece of a craftsman. I have to savor it properly, she begins eating slowly."},{"lineNumber":251654,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見てランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing that, Rance says,"},{"lineNumber":251655,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、今のうちに攻撃をガンガンかけろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, attack her relentlessly while she’s distracted."},{"lineNumber":251656,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴は毒だんごに夢中だ、香ちゃん、もっといったぱい作れ、そして投げろー","translatedEnglishLine":"She’s obsessed with the poison dumplings. Kō-chan, make a lot more and throw them!"},{"lineNumber":251657,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアはバタンと倒れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia collapsed with a thud."},{"lineNumber":251658,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアは死にかけた時、最後に言う　死ぬ前にあれをもう一本食わせてくれ","translatedEnglishLine":"When Galtia was about to die, she said one last thing: 'Before I die, please let me have one more of those.'"},{"lineNumber":251659,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、うめぇ・お前、世界一のだんご職人だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahh, delicious... You’re the world’s best dumpling maker."},{"lineNumber":251660,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにいってんだ、こいつは世界一だんご作りが下手だぞ、とランス","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying? She’s the worst dumpling maker in the world, says Rance."},{"lineNumber":251661,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかってないな、そうか、このうまさは人間どもには強すぎて毒なのかもしれんな","translatedEnglishLine":"You don’t understand. I see, this deliciousness might be too strong for humans — it could be poison for them."},{"lineNumber":251662,"originalJapaneseLine":"はははは、この味が分かるのは俺だけという訳か、なんかうれしいな","translatedEnglishLine":"Hahaha, so I’m the only one who can understand this flavor. Somehow, that makes me happy."},{"lineNumber":251663,"originalJapaneseLine":"といいながら死んでいく","translatedEnglishLine":"And with that, she dies."},{"lineNumber":251664,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐっ、くやしいとランスもだんごを食うが、やっぱり気絶","translatedEnglishLine":"Gritting his teeth in frustration, Rance eats a dumpling too, but ends up passing out as well."},{"lineNumber":251665,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティア様がやられたぞ・・魔物兵があわてて逃げて行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia-sama has been defeated... The monster soldiers hurriedly flee."},{"lineNumber":251666,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはすぐにこの方面の魔軍全体に広がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"This quickly spread throughout the entire demon army in this area."},{"lineNumber":251667,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアのお陰で戦う事もなく人間から食料を奪い、くっちゃねくっちゃねして","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to Galtia, the demon soldiers who had been stealing food from humans and lazing around without fighting,"},{"lineNumber":251668,"originalJapaneseLine":"のほほんと過ごしてきた魔軍兵士は攻めてきたゼス軍に対処出来ずに潰走","translatedEnglishLine":"were unprepared and overwhelmed, so they were routed by the advancing Zeth army."},{"lineNumber":251669,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":251670,"originalJapaneseLine":"司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Headquarters"},{"lineNumber":251671,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックと千鶴子、ランスがガルティアを倒した事を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic and Chizuruko hear that Rance defeated Galtia."},{"lineNumber":251672,"originalJapaneseLine":"うれしい、でも、敵はまだ強大、メディウサ・・そして多数の魔軍","translatedEnglishLine":"They're glad, but the enemy is still powerful: Medusa... and a large demon army."},{"lineNumber":251673,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t２回目間大量の料理をランス達は食べきり、大食い競争は引き分けとなる","translatedEnglishLine":"During the second round, Rance and others finish eating a large amount of food, resulting in a draw in the eating contest."},{"lineNumber":251674,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tガルティアは感激する。人間なのにすごいな。お前ら","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia is impressed: 'Even though you’re human, that’s amazing. You guys.'"},

{"lineNumber":251675,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tではもう食後のデザートだ、まだあるのかよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"'Well then, here comes the dessert after the meal. Is there still more...?'"},

{"lineNumber":251676,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t何か話の流れがあって、香姫のだんごをガルティアが食べる","translatedEnglishLine":"Following some flow of conversation, Galtia eats Kōhime’s dumplings."},

{"lineNumber":251677,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそして団子に惚れ込んで、ランス達の仲間に加わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, fascinated by the dumplings, she joins Rance and his companions."},

{"lineNumber":251678,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tガルティアが裏切った、逃げろー魔物兵は敗走","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia betrayed them! Run! The monster soldiers rout in defeat."},

{"lineNumber":251679,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t司令部、マジック、千鶴子、ほっと一息","translatedEnglishLine":"At headquarters, Magic and Chizuruko breathe a sigh of relief."},

{"lineNumber":251680,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t内容は(２３０／その後の戦局Ａ)とほぼ同じ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The content is almost the same as (230 / Subsequent Battle Situation A)."}, 

{"lineNumber":251681,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tただし、ガルティアは殺されたではなく魔軍を裏切って","translatedEnglishLine":"However, instead of being killed, Galtia betrays the demon army,"},

{"lineNumber":251682,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの仲間になったという展開で","translatedEnglishLine":"and the story develops with her becoming Rance’s ally."},

{"lineNumber":251683,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t臨時首都にランス達が戻る、ガルティアをみんなに紹介","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others return to the temporary capital and introduce Galtia to everyone."},

{"lineNumber":251684,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tカオスはガルティアを殺したそうだったが、昨晩男同士で話をして意気投合している？","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos apparently wanted to kill Galtia, but after talking as men last night, they bonded?"},

{"lineNumber":251685,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこいつなかなかいいやつだ、殺すのは少し後でもいいなとか","translatedEnglishLine":"'This guy’s pretty good after all, maybe we can kill her a little later,' or something like that."},

{"lineNumber":251686,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tゼスの面々との会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation with the Zeth personnel."},

{"lineNumber":251687,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t誰かがガルティアの食事について不安がってもいいかな、食事どうしようとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe someone expresses concern about Galtia’s diet, like 'What about her meals?'"},

{"lineNumber":251688,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tガルティア、たまには絶食してもいいぜ、けっこう食ったしな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Galtia can fast occasionally; she’s eaten quite a bit."},

{"lineNumber":251689,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t一日１００キロでいいや。どこが絶食やねんとか","translatedEnglishLine":"'Eating 100 kilos a day is fine.' 'How is that fasting?' and so on."},

{"lineNumber":251690,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス、とりあえず今回の作戦は完了だな、いったん戻るか","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance says, 'For now, this operation is complete. Let’s return for the time being.'"}, 

{"lineNumber":251691,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだが、早く済んだから予定していたより時間もあるな・・","translatedEnglishLine":"But since it finished early, we have more time than planned..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断るとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you refuse, says Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、大食い競争で勝負だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then we'll settle it with an eating contest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、うっとおしい、男なら武力で勝負だ。女の奪い合いはケンカと昔から決まっているのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, annoying! If you're a man, then fight with force. Competing over women has always been settled by fighting since old times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件．香姫が場にいる時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Kōhime is on the field

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹が減ったと言い出すガルティア。腹の穴が開き吸い込み始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia suddenly says she's hungry. A hole opens in her stomach and begins sucking in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てランス、やばい・・こっちみろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, Rance thinks, 'Oh no... Look over here!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と香姫を使う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He uses Kōhime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは腹の穴を止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia stops the hole in her stomach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件．場にカロリアが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: Karoria is on the field

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに　戦闘／香姫で　吸い込み攻撃は止めている状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where the suction attack has already been stopped by Kōhime during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カロリア、ムシ使い関係の何か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Karoria, something related to bug taming...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　ガルティア戦Ｂ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle - Galtia fight B

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件．前のターンに香姫が毒だんご攻撃をした時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: When Kōhime used a poison dumpling attack in the previous turn

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待てとガルティア。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment, says Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さきほどの攻撃で香姫が投げつけた　だんごを大事に持っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is carefully holding the dumpling that Kōhime threw in the earlier attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは匠の名品、味わってくわないといけないとゆっくり食べ始める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a masterpiece of a craftsman. I have to savor it properly, she begins eating slowly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを見てランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing that, Rance says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、今のうちに攻撃をガンガンかけろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, attack her relentlessly while she’s distracted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴は毒だんごに夢中だ、香ちゃん、もっといったぱい作れ、そして投げろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s obsessed with the poison dumplings. Kō-chan, make a lot more and throw them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアはバタンと倒れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia collapsed with a thud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは死にかけた時、最後に言う　死ぬ前にあれをもう一本食わせてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Galtia was about to die, she said one last thing: 'Before I die, please let me have one more of those.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、うめぇ・お前、世界一のだんご職人だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahh, delicious... You’re the world’s best dumpling maker.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにいってんだ、こいつは世界一だんご作りが下手だぞ、とランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying? She’s the worst dumpling maker in the world, says Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかってないな、そうか、このうまさは人間どもには強すぎて毒なのかもしれんな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You don’t understand. I see, this deliciousness might be too strong for humans — it could be poison for them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はははは、この味が分かるのは俺だけという訳か、なんかうれしいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, so I’m the only one who can understand this flavor. Somehow, that makes me happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: といいながら死んでいく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, she dies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ、くやしいとランスもだんごを食うが、やっぱり気絶
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gritting his teeth in frustration, Rance eats a dumpling too, but ends up passing out as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティア様がやられたぞ・・魔物兵があわてて逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia-sama has been defeated... The monster soldiers hurriedly flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはすぐにこの方面の魔軍全体に広がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This quickly spread throughout the entire demon army in this area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアのお陰で戦う事もなく人間から食料を奪い、くっちゃねくっちゃねして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to Galtia, the demon soldiers who had been stealing food from humans and lazing around without fighting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のほほんと過ごしてきた魔軍兵士は攻めてきたゼス軍に対処出来ずに潰走
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were unprepared and overwhelmed, so they were routed by the advancing Zeth army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックと千鶴子、ランスがガルティアを倒した事を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and Chizuruko hear that Rance defeated Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うれしい、でも、敵はまだ強大、メディウサ・・そして多数の魔軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're glad, but the enemy is still powerful: Medusa... and a large demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２回目間大量の料理をランス達は食べきり、大食い競争は引き分けとなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the second round, Rance and others finish eating a large amount of food, resulting in a draw in the eating contest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアは感激する。人間なのにすごいな。お前ら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia is impressed: 'Even though you’re human, that’s amazing. You guys.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ではもう食後のデザートだ、まだあるのかよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Well then, here comes the dessert after the meal. Is there still more...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か話の流れがあって、香姫のだんごをガルティアが食べる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following some flow of conversation, Galtia eats Kōhime’s dumplings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして団子に惚れ込んで、ランス達の仲間に加わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, fascinated by the dumplings, she joins Rance and his companions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアが裏切った、逃げろー魔物兵は敗走
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia betrayed them! Run! The monster soldiers rout in defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部、マジック、千鶴子、ほっと一息
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At headquarters, Magic and Chizuruko breathe a sigh of relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容は(２３０／その後の戦局Ａ)とほぼ同じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content is almost the same as (230 / Subsequent Battle Situation A).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし、ガルティアは殺されたではなく魔軍を裏切って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, instead of being killed, Galtia betrays the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの仲間になったという展開で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the story develops with her becoming Rance’s ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臨時首都にランス達が戻る、ガルティアをみんなに紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others return to the temporary capital and introduce Galtia to everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスはガルティアを殺したそうだったが、昨晩男同士で話をして意気投合している？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos apparently wanted to kill Galtia, but after talking as men last night, they bonded?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつなかなかいいやつだ、殺すのは少し後でもいいなとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'This guy’s pretty good after all, maybe we can kill her a little later,' or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの面々との会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with the Zeth personnel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かがガルティアの食事について不安がってもいいかな、食事どうしようとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe someone expresses concern about Galtia’s diet, like 'What about her meals?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティア、たまには絶食してもいいぜ、けっこう食ったしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia can fast occasionally; she’s eaten quite a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日１００キロでいいや。どこが絶食やねんとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Eating 100 kilos a day is fine.' 'How is that fasting?' and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、とりあえず今回の作戦は完了だな、いったん戻るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance says, 'For now, this operation is complete. Let’s return for the time being.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、早く済んだから予定していたより時間もあるな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But since it finished early, we have more time than planned...
